resources.title: The DevSecOps Handbook
resources.description: The definitive guide to integrating security into DevOps by Gene Kim, Jez Humble, and others. Learn how to build security into every stage of the software delivery lifecycle.
resources.author: Gene Kim, Jez Humble, John Willis

resources.title: Security Engineering: A Guide to Building Dependable Distributed Systems
resources.description: Comprehensive textbook on security engineering by Ross Anderson. Available free online, covering everything from basic principles to advanced topics.
resources.author: Ross Anderson

resources.title: OWASP Web Security Testing Guide
resources.description: Comprehensive web application security testing guide. Free resource from OWASP covering all aspects of web security testing.
resources.author: OWASP Foundation

resources.title: OWASP Cheat Sheet Series
resources.description: Practical security guides for developers. Concise collection of high-value information on specific application security topics.
resources.author: OWASP Foundation

resources.title: Container Security: Fundamental Technology Concepts that Protect Containerized Applications
resources.description: Deep dive into container security by Liz Rice. Covers container isolation, runtime security, and securing the container lifecycle.
resources.author: Liz Rice

resources.title: DEV540: Secure DevOps: A Practitioner's Approach
resources.description: Intensive 5-day SANS course covering DevSecOps principles, tools, and practices. Includes hands-on labs and leads to GIAC certification.

resources.title: DevSecOps Specialization
resources.description: Comprehensive Coursera specialization covering DevSecOps fundamentals, security integration, and automation. Certificate upon completion.

resources.title: DevSecOps Fundamentals
resources.description: Affordable introduction to DevSecOps concepts, tools, and implementation. Good starting point for beginners.

resources.title: GIAC DevSecOps (GDS)
resources.description: Industry-recognized certification for DevSecOps practitioners. Validates knowledge of security integration in DevOps.

resources.title: Certified Secure Software Lifecycle Professional (CSSLP)
resources.description: ISC² certification for secure software development throughout the lifecycle. Advanced certification for experienced professionals.

resources.title: DevSecCon YouTube Channel
resources.description: Conference talks, tutorials, and interviews from DevSecCon events. Excellent free resource for staying current with DevSecOps trends.

resources.title: OWASP Foundation YouTube
resources.description: OWASP conference talks, project updates, and educational content. Deep technical content on application security.

resources.title: KubeCon Security Track
resources.description: Cloud native security talks from KubeCon + CloudNativeCon. Focus on Kubernetes and cloud-native security.

resources.title: The Secure Developer
resources.description: Interviews with security leaders and practitioners. Covers DevSecOps, AppSec, and secure development practices.

resources.title: Security Weekly Podcast Network
resources.description: Multiple security-focused podcasts covering application security, network security, and industry news.

resources.title: Darknet Diaries
resources.description: True stories from the dark side of the internet. Engaging stories about hackers, breaches, and cybercrime.

resources.title: DevSecOps.org Blog
resources.description: Community-driven DevSecOps content. Articles, guides, and best practices from practitioners.

resources.title: Snyk Blog
resources.description: Developer security content from Snyk. Tutorials, best practices, and security research.

resources.title: Netflix Security Blog
resources.description: Insights into Netflix's security practices. High-quality content from a leading tech company.

resources.title: GitHub Security Blog
resources.description: Security research, vulnerability disclosures, and secure development practices from GitHub.

resources.title: Hack The Box
resources.description: Penetration testing labs and CTF challenges. Practice offensive security in a legal environment.

resources.title: TryHackMe
resources.description: Gamified cybersecurity learning platform. Structured learning paths for beginners to advanced.

resources.title: PortSwigger Web Security Academy
resources.description: Free web security training from the makers of Burp Suite. Hands-on labs for each vulnerability type.

resources.title: PicoCTF
resources.description: Free cybersecurity education platform for beginners. Designed by Carnegie Mellon University.

resources.title: TLDR Security Newsletter
resources.description: Daily curated security news and resources. Quick, digestible security updates.

resources.title: DevSecOps Weekly
resources.description: Weekly curated DevSecOps content. Articles, tools, and news for DevSecOps practitioners.
